name: hologram-inventory
description: Interactive hologram inventory wall demo powered by Node, Express, and MySQL.

scripts.db:setup: bash -lc 'if [ ! -f .env ]; then echo "Missing .env"; exit 1; fi; source .env && if [ -z "$DB_HOST" ] || [ -z "$DB_USER" ] || [ -z "$DB_NAME" ]; then echo "DB_HOST, DB_USER, and DB_NAME must be set"; exit 1; fi; MYSQL_PWD="$DB_PASSWORD" mysql -h"$DB_HOST" -u"$DB_USER" "$DB_NAME" < schema.sql && MYSQL_PWD="$DB_PASSWORD" mysql -h"$DB_HOST" -u"$DB_USER" "$DB_NAME" < seed.sql'
